projects.title: Social Media Backend API - CI/CD Pipeline
projects.description: I use those technologies: GitLab CI/CD, Gitlab Container Registry, Docker, AWS EC2, AWS Parameter Store, AWS SSM, AWS RDS to deploy a backend API for a social media application with a complete CI/CD pipeline.
